text: EDHEC Business School is a European higher studies establishment. The school is in 5 places, in Paris, Lille and Nice, France, in the United Kingdom (London) and in Singapore. It was created in 1906.Business school: l'Edhec monte en grade EDHEC specializes in the fields of economics, financeMasters in Finance Pre-experience 2014 and management. ==References== == Other websites == * EDHEC website Category:Education in France Category:Lille Category:1906 establishments
title: EDHEC Business School
